plot: Sharda Yadav is the widow of Ramnath, who was a freedom fighter. Now she lives a poor but very respectable lifestyle with her two sons, Krishna and Arjun, in a small rural town in India. ...
title: Krishna Arjun
plot_es: Sharda Yadav is the widow of Ramnath, who was a freedom fighter. Now she lives a poor but very respectable lifestyle with her two sons, Krishna and Arjun, in a small rural town in India. ...
